html: #2A A well regulated Militia, being necessary to the security of a free State, the right of the people to keep and bear Arms, shall not be infringed. 1. It is the 2nd Amendment. 2. It is an individual right. 3. It says "keep and bear". 4. It says "shall not be infringed".
text:
#2A A well regulated Militia, being necessary to the security of a free State, the right of the people to keep and bear Arms, shall not be infringed.

1. It is the 2nd Amendment. 
2. It is an individual right.
3. It says "keep and bear".
4. It says "shall not be infringed".

You can only pick one:
1) Abortion is just 3% of what PP does.
2) Abortion is so central to what PP does that it can't possibly be separated to preserve Title X funding.
